column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Mom and I ordered tapas.  Bacon wrapped dates were delicious as always.  We had the ham hash with an egg
column3: just a little too sweet for me.  Now
column4: the waffle with carmelized bananas was so good
column5: my mom absolutely loved it.  The mac n' cheese w/ bacon was not very cheesy
column6: we basically just ate the tasty bacon from it.  the last and also delicious item we had was spinach and artichoke crepe.  It was really flavorful and something I had never tried before.
